name: The Meowdium
description:
THE MEOWDIUM A magical, finger-twisting search for lost kitten


Will you help the Meowdium to find the lost kittens?
 Of course you will, you are not a monster.

Embark on your new journey, full of procedural cats and beautiful hand-drawn animations.

The Meowdium is the result of Global Game Jam 2021.

It's a game heavily inspired by Twister. It's meant to be played with your fingers, but every body-part is valid (Feet DLC coming soon)

Instructions

To play The Meowdium you only need your keyboard. Keep pressed all the letters the Meowdium puts on the table, and you will eventually find a new furry friend (countless procedurally generated cats)

Credits

Sergio Osimo - Programming and Design
Alessia Azalina - Art and Design
Davide Crespellani - Animations
Filippo Gabello - Producer and Sound Design
Federico Di Cera (Waxwolf) - Music 
Chiara Preziosi - Voiceover
